casebody.data:
Benjamin F. HOWARD
v.
STATE. No. 344P04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 3, 2005. Christopher W. Brooks, Assistant Attorney General, Peter S. Gilchrist, III, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 7th day of July 2004 by Plaintiff for a hearing on the merits:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 3rd day of February 2005."
